sn12.24:4.2: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya rājagahaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
sn12.24:4.5: Yannūnāhaṃ yena aññatitthiyānaṃ paribbājakānaṃ ārāmo tenupasaṅkameyyan”ti.
sn12.24:5.1: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto yena aññatitthiyānaṃ paribbājakānaṃ ārāmo tenupasaṅkami;
sn12.24:5.2: upasaṅkamitvā tehi aññatitthiyehi paribbājakehi saddhiṃ sammodi.
sn12.24:5.3: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
sn12.24:5.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ te aññatitthiyā paribbājakā etadavocuṃ:
sn12.24:6.1: “Santāvuso sāriputta, eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā kammavādā sayaṃkataṃ dukkhaṃ paññapenti.
sn12.24:6.2: Santi panāvuso sāriputta, eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā kammavādā paraṃkataṃ dukkhaṃ paññapenti.
sn12.24:6.3: Santāvuso sāriputta, eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā kammavādā sayaṃkatañca paraṃkatañca dukkhaṃ paññapenti.
sn12.24:6.4: Santi panāvuso sāriputta, eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā kammavādā asayaṃkāraṃ aparaṅkāraṃ adhiccasamuppannaṃ dukkhaṃ paññapenti.
sn12.24:6.5: Idha, panāvuso sāriputta, samaṇo gotamo kiṃvādī kimakkhāyī?
sn12.24:6.6: Kathaṃ byākaramānā ca mayaṃ vuttavādino ceva samaṇassa gotamassa assāma, na ca samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ abhūtena abbhācikkheyyāma, dhammassa cānudhammaṃ byākareyyāma, na ca koci sahadhammiko vādānupāto gārayhaṃ ṭhānaṃ āgaccheyyā”ti?
sn12.24:7.4: Iti vadaṃ vuttavādī ceva bhagavato assa, na ca bhagavantaṃ abhūtena abbhācikkheyya, dhammassa cānudhammaṃ byākareyya, na ca koci sahadhammiko vādānupāto gārayhaṃ ṭhānaṃ āgaccheyya.
sn12.24:8.1: Tatrāvuso, ye te samaṇabrāhmaṇā kammavādā sayaṅkataṃ dukkhaṃ paññapenti tadapi phassapaccayā.
sn12.24:8.2: Yepi te samaṇabrāhmaṇā kammavādā paraṅkataṃ dukkhaṃ paññapenti tadapi phassapaccayā.
sn12.24:8.3: Yepi te samaṇabrāhmaṇā kammavādā sayaṅkatañca paraṅkatañca dukkhaṃ paññapenti tadapi phassapaccayā.
sn12.24:8.4: Yepi te samaṇabrāhmaṇā kammavādā asayaṅkāraṃ aparaṅkāraṃ adhiccasamuppannaṃ dukkhaṃ paññapenti tadapi phassapaccayā.
sn12.24:9.1: Tatrāvuso, ye te samaṇabrāhmaṇā kammavādā sayaṅkataṃ dukkhaṃ paññapenti, te vata aññatra phassā paṭisaṃvedissantīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
sn12.24:9.2: Yepi te samaṇabrāhmaṇā kammavādā paraṅkataṃ dukkhaṃ paññapenti, te vata aññatra phassā paṭisaṃvedissantīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
sn12.24:9.3: Yepi te samaṇabrāhmaṇā kammavādā sayaṅkatañca paraṅkatañca dukkhaṃ paññapenti, te vata aññatra phassā paṭisaṃvedissantīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
sn12.24:9.4: Yepi te samaṇabrāhmaṇā kammavādā asayaṅkāraṃ aparaṅkāraṃ adhiccasamuppannaṃ dukkhaṃ paññapenti, te vata aññatra phassā paṭisaṃvedissantīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī”ti.
sn12.24:10.1: Assosi kho āyasmā ānando āyasmato sāriputtassa tehi aññatitthiyehi paribbājakehi saddhiṃ imaṃ kathāsallāpaṃ.
sn12.24:10.2: Atha kho āyasmā ānando rājagahe piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn12.24:10.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando yāvatako āyasmato sāriputtassa tehi aññatitthiyehi paribbājakehi saddhiṃ ahosi kathāsallāpo taṃ sabbaṃ bhagavato ārocesi.
sn12.24:11.1: “Sādhu sādhu, ānanda, yathā taṃ sāriputto sammā byākaramāno byākareyya.
sn12.24:11.2: Paṭiccasamuppannaṃ kho, ānanda, dukkhaṃ vuttaṃ mayā.
sn12.24:11.5: Iti vadaṃ vuttavādī ceva me assa, na ca maṃ abhūtena abbhācikkheyya, dhammassa cānudhammaṃ byākareyya, na ca koci sahadhammiko vādānupāto gārayhaṃ ṭhānaṃ āgaccheyya.
sn12.24:12.1: Tatrānanda, ye te samaṇabrāhmaṇā kammavādā sayaṅkataṃ dukkhaṃ paññapenti tadapi phassapaccayā.
sn12.24:12.4: yepi te samaṇabrāhmaṇā kammavādā asayaṅkāraṃ aparaṅkāraṃ adhiccasamuppannaṃ dukkhaṃ paññapenti tadapi phassapaccayā.
sn12.24:13.1: Tatrānanda, yepi te samaṇabrāhmaṇā kammavādā sayaṅkataṃ dukkhaṃ paññapenti, te vata aññatra phassā paṭisaṃvedissantīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
sn12.24:13.4: yepi te samaṇabrāhmaṇā kammavādā asayaṅkāraṃ aparaṅkāraṃ adhiccasamuppannaṃ dukkhaṃ paññapenti, te vata aññatra phassā paṭisaṃvedissantīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
sn12.24:14.1: Ekamidāhaṃ, ānanda, samayaṃ idheva rājagahe viharāmi veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
sn12.24:14.2: Atha khvāhaṃ, ānanda, pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya rājagahaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisiṃ.
sn12.24:14.5: Yannūnāhaṃ yena aññatitthiyānaṃ paribbājakānaṃ ārāmo tenupasaṅkameyyan’ti.
sn12.24:15.1: Atha khvāhaṃ, ānanda, yena aññatitthiyānaṃ paribbājakānaṃ ārāmo tenupasaṅkamiṃ;
sn12.24:15.2: upasaṅkamitvā tehi aññatitthiyehi paribbājakehi saddhiṃ sammodiṃ.
sn12.24:15.3: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃ.
sn12.24:15.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho maṃ, ānanda, te aññatitthiyā paribbājakā etadavocuṃ:
sn12.24:16.1: ‘Santāvuso gotama, eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā kammavādā sayaṅkataṃ dukkhaṃ paññapenti.
sn12.24:16.2: Santi panāvuso gotama, eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā kammavādā paraṅkataṃ dukkhaṃ paññapenti.
sn12.24:16.3: Santāvuso gotama, eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā kammavādā sayaṅkatañca paraṅkatañca dukkhaṃ paññapenti.
sn12.24:16.4: Santi panāvuso gotama, eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā kammavādā asayaṅkāraṃ aparaṅkāraṃ adhiccasamuppannaṃ dukkhaṃ paññapenti.
sn12.24:16.5: Idha no āyasmā gotamo kiṃvādī kimakkhāyī?
sn12.24:16.6: Kathaṃ byākaramānā ca mayaṃ vuttavādino ceva āyasmato gotamassa assāma, na ca āyasmantaṃ gotamaṃ abhūtena abbhācikkheyyāma, dhammassa cānudhammaṃ byākareyyāma, na ca koci sahadhammiko vādānupāto gārayhaṃ ṭhānaṃ āgaccheyyā’ti?
sn12.24:17.1: Evaṃ vuttāhaṃ, ānanda, te aññatitthiye paribbājake etadavocaṃ:
sn12.24:17.5: Iti vadaṃ vuttavādī ceva me assa, na ca maṃ abhūtena abbhācikkheyya, dhammassa cānudhammaṃ byākareyya, na ca koci sahadhammiko vādānupāto gārayhaṃ ṭhānaṃ āgaccheyyāti.
sn12.24:18.1: Tatrāvuso, ye te samaṇabrāhmaṇā kammavādā sayaṅkataṃ dukkhaṃ paññapenti tadapi phassapaccayā.
sn12.24:18.4: yepi te samaṇabrāhmaṇā kammavādā asayaṅkāraṃ aparaṅkāraṃ adhiccasamuppannaṃ dukkhaṃ paññapenti tadapi phassapaccayā.
sn12.24:19.1: Tatrāvuso, ye te samaṇabrāhmaṇā kammavādā sayaṅkataṃ dukkhaṃ paññapenti, te vata aññatra phassā paṭisaṃvedissantīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
sn12.24:19.4: yepi te samaṇabrāhmaṇā kammavādā asayaṅkāraṃ aparaṅkāraṃ adhiccasamuppannaṃ dukkhaṃ paññapenti, te vata aññatra phassā paṭisaṃvedissantīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī’”ti.
sn12.24:20.2: Yatra hi nāma ekena padena sabbo attho vutto bhavissati.
sn12.24:20.3: Siyā nu kho, bhante, esevattho vitthārena vuccamāno gambhīro ceva assa gambhīrāvabhāso cā”ti?
sn12.24:21.3: ‘jarāmaraṇaṃ, āvuso ānanda, kiṃnidānaṃ kiṃsamudayaṃ kiṃjātikaṃ kiṃpabhavan’ti?
sn12.24:21.5: ‘jarāmaraṇaṃ kho, āvuso, jātinidānaṃ jātisamudayaṃ jātijātikaṃ jātipabhavan’ti.
sn12.24:22.2: ‘jāti panāvuso ānanda, kiṃnidānā kiṃsamudayā kiṃjātikā kiṃpabhavā’ti?
sn12.24:22.4: ‘jāti kho, āvuso, bhavanidānā bhavasamudayā bhavajātikā bhavappabhavā’ti.
sn12.24:23.2: ‘bhavo panāvuso ānanda, kiṃnidāno kiṃsamudayo kiṃjātiko kiṃpabhavo’ti?
sn12.24:23.4: ‘bhavo kho, āvuso, upādānanidāno upādānasamudayo upādānajātiko upādānappabhavo’ti.
sn12.24:24.6: ‘phasso panāvuso ānanda, kiṃnidāno kiṃsamudayo kiṃjātiko kiṃpabhavo’ti?
sn12.24:24.8: ‘phasso kho, āvuso, saḷāyatananidāno saḷāyatanasamudayo saḷāyatanajātiko saḷāyatanappabhavo’ti.
